methods.name: mint_climatecoin
methods.desc: mints the climatecoin asa. CAN only be executed ONCE by the contract deployer.

methods.name: set_minter_address
methods.desc: sets the nft minter address. In case we use a differente asa NOT minted by the contract.

methods.name: set_dump
methods.desc: sets the dumping app id for the minted NFTSs

methods.name: create_nft
methods.desc: Create an nft with appropriate parameters, return its id

methods.name: unfreeze_nft
methods.desc: Create an nft with appropriate parameters, return its id

methods.name: burn_parameters
methods.desc: Burn climatecoins to compensate the emissions from an asset

methods.name: move
methods.desc: Moves the asset passed from one account to another
